Package com.epam.esm.controller

Class OrderController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epam.esm.controller.OrderController
  • @RestController
@RequestMapping("/orders")
public class OrderController
extends java.lang.Object
    Class is an endpoint of the API which performs operations on orders.

      • getOrdersByUserId

        @GetMapping("/users/{userId}")
public PageDto<OrderDto> getOrdersByUserId​(@PathVariable
                                           long userId,
                                           @RequestParam
                                           java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> pageParams)
        Gets order by user id, processes GET requests at /orders/users/{userId}
        Parameters:
        userId - the user id whose orders need to find
        pageParams - the data for pagination
        Returns:
        the page with found orders and total number of positions
